(MAC SUPPORT)

Mac, I cant launch my game! how do I fix it!??

Open Terminal (app) and paste this

(leave only you're mac username remove the parenthesis)

chmod +x "/Users/(your mac username)/Desktop/Game.app/Contents/MacOS/rpginabox"
